text: Bijay Mohanty (8 April 1950 â€“ 20 July 2020) was an Indian actor. He was born in Baripada, Odisha. He was in the film Chilika Teerey, which was given a prize at the National Film Awards. He was known for his roles in Naga Phasa, Suna Panjuri, and Sahara Jaluchi. Mohanty died from cardiac arrest-related problems on 20 July 2020 at a hospital in Bhubaneswar, Odisha at the age of 70.Renowned Odia actor Bijay Mohanty dies at 70 ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Actors from Odisha
title: Bijay Mohanty
